website_summaries.verdict: Heavy duty fan in a small package. Unique design creates dual channels of air flow to cover multiple points at the same time.
pros: Top stage pivots while the bottom part remains stationary
Design offers plenty of positioning options for optimal coverage
cons: Fan is slightly more complicated to set up and control

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived re-packaged and defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this fan as a replacement for my aging desk fan, which is the exact model (albeit in white). As soon as I opened the box - after schlepping it to work - I knew I was in trouble. The box had been previously opened, and judging by the sloppy tape job, which looked liked the work of a toddler, I could tell the fan had been re-packaged. Sure enough, the top speed worked but was very noisy, and the bottom two speeds were completely defective, with the fan not even moving. I resent being sold recycled garbage. Wouldn't you?
customer_reviews.author: C. Roehrs

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine, and,not at all that loud.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how the reviewers think this is a LOUD fan. It's not that loud. I was disappointed that this fan is nowhere near as loud as some make it out to be. I use fans for white noise while sleeping. This is a "loud enough but not a jet engine" loud fan. It's not at all whisper-quiet, but, gosh, seriously, people, if you're one who thinks this is loud, then a car driving by your house must be deafening. Fan works just fine, not that loud, don't believe those with the sensitive hearing.
customer_reviews.author: B.J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great space saving, powerful yet quiet bathroom fan
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a fan for my small bathroom that doesn’t have anything but a vent fan. Between hot showers, hair dryers, styling irons and Florida heat it’s so nice to have this to cool down. I usually turn off the lights in the am to do my hair cause it’s so hot (east sun rising into my bathroom). Best is the white color, not black or chrome, and tall not wide since I have an old home with little counter space. Simply put baby in the corner and plug in as I need. Oh and its another fan during hurricane season Too bad it’s not USB or battery chargeable but it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Good desktop fan.
customer_reviews.text: Good fan. Has three speeds, lowest speed is quiet enough to keep it on the desk, few feet away, for the whole day. I also like that it has two nozzles to increase coverage which is much needed on tower fans.
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this for the second time. First unit I had to send back because there were parts rolling around inside unit and one screw that fell out upon unpackaging. Sent that one back for replacement. Unpackaged and plugged in second fan. Immediately I was blasted with terrible plastic smell. Thinking it would get better after few days of use I kept it. The smell has not gone away at all. It can be smelled up to ten feet away. Additionally, this fan vibrates on all speeds and is very noisy. I would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: BMCK

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and vibrates
customer_reviews.text: Needed a fan with a small footprint, this fit the bill. Let me just say I should have given more credence to the reviews stating how noisy this fan is. It's absolutely awful, there is no way a fan should be this noisy and vibrate this much. It's almost like the bearings are completely worn out, or the person responsible for balancing the fan blades is either clueless or sleeping on the job! Now if you need the fan to keep you cool and you live at the end of the runway at O'Hare International, you probably won't hear the fan over the jet engines.......probably.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan for Office
customer_reviews.text: Great little fan for the cubicle. I'm very impressed by the amount of air that it can circulate. It has three different speed settings that are activated by pressing the power button multiple times. The rotate feature is very useful too. It's very quiet even at the highest fan speed. I'm very happy with the purchase. Prime delivered in just days.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing little fan
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing little fan! I was watching the price on this because I had a old dinky holmes 'blizzard' fan in my room that was on the fritz. this one SO MUCH better. one simiple button, default is a 'stage 3' the rotate button cycles through one fan osculating both, top, bottom etc. Cord is also longer than my blizzard so no more tripping over it at night! (I have one outlet in my bedroom yay old houses) Update; almost two years of nightly use. Still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a good fan and it does work. I bought it as a replacement for another brand that started to rattle and make too much noise, so I was really hoping this one would be quiet. Unfortunately, it has started to vibrate and rattle already; less than a day after I started using it. It is sitting on a carpeted floor and it still vibrates too much. Oh well, at least it was cheap, but I guess I'll have to keep looking for a quieter fan. The full-sized tower fan I have from this brand is much quieter than this one, but I wanted a smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Giddings

customer_reviews.title: Used piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: My coworker has this fan, so I know how it should work. The box was damaged with the top flap completely ripped off. The body of the fan was grimy in spots (fingerprints?). The top speed was noiser than it should be while the medium and low speed barely made a breeze. I am returning it, but I don't appreciate getting something that was clearly previously used.
customer_reviews.author: CatK

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for smaller space
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these fans and move them around as required. They are great for smaller spaces and are easily placed on the counter tops of bathrooms, dens and kitchens. Not as effective in a large room. The top part can be adjusted relative to the bottom part, and will direct air in different directions, while stationary or oscillating. I've rated it four stars because in smaller rooms this fan can be slightly noisy on high speed. Medium and low speed are quite acceptable. Note for those concerned about color: Depending on the model number, some fans described as "Platinum" are white, and some are a nondescript grey. Check which one you are ordering or you might be surprised.
customer_reviews.author: BigHemi

customer_reviews.title: White tower has black cord and blue plug in
customer_reviews.text: Thinking about sending back as the Platinum/white tower comes with a black cord and a blue plug in and not looking good in the bathroom. Why not a white cord to match? Did I just get one made wrong? No pics show the cord so can't see is not white. It does seem to be a good fan for our small bathroom. Do wonder about the off/on feature button wearing out quickly as to turn on it goes to high and then click to go medium to low. To turn off have to go all the way to low and then off which will wear the button out that doesn't seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie K. Glass

customer_reviews.title: Small, quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little fan. I have it on a table about six feet from my desk and on low it generates a nice little breeze so that I don't have to crank up the AC. It oscillates effectively over a limited range and creates little background noise. The top and bottom are slightly offset from each other, to increase the area being cooled. I even leave it on when I am in Zoom meetings because it doesn't add much ambient noise. It's way quieter than the fan in my computer. It's small, so it's not going to cool a room, but if it's just you in a reasonably sized space, it works.
customer_reviews.author: David Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Horrible desk fan
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst desk fan I have ever purchased. The ratings were good, but I'm not sure why. It's extremely noisy, it doesn't start properly when turned on and has to take a minute for the fan to get going, barely blows out any air. I should have stuck with the same model I purchased for my desk at work. Will be returning this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Sileste Overton Work

customer_reviews.title: Night time white noise air mover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit to replace a very old (like 10 years old) version that was noisy and full of "stuff". I use it to keep the air circulating near the bed and to create a white noise to induce/maintain sleep. The new unit fits the bill and is actually better since the noise level is minimal rather than the worn out noise from the oscillating. Wish I had replaced it a couple of years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rondeau

customer_reviews.title: Great fan in a makeup Room . Quiet and powerful enough to keep model cool
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love this fan ! They use it during make up Sessions in their bathroom . Sometimes during photo shoot they have to work on several models and although the main makeup lights are 2000 w equivalent LED array , it still gets hot . This fan fits perfectly on makeup table and is not noisy , and Ossilates and keeps everyone cool. Great value ... hopefully can last longer than a smaller transitional round bulky fan .
customer_reviews.author: Serge A.

customer_reviews.title: Received dust blowing fan.
customer_reviews.text: We just opened the box and plugged it in our child's room. As soon as it was plugged in, a large cloud of " dust" came pouring out. We don't feel comfortable leaving in our small child's room, so we are going to try contacting the seller again. If no response again, throwing away and buying elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Cute desktop fan!
customer_reviews.text: Love this desktop fan. It's quiet, and has 3 speeds. Top part can be turned in different directions, and it can be set to oscillate (blow back and forth). Love that the on/off switch lights up, so you can find it faster, but it only lights up while the fan is turned on. When the fan is off, there is no light, and makes it difficult to find the switch. I use this fan at my bedside, so when the room is pitch black, I struggle to find the on switch. That is why I can't give it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Lee Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: There's a little man inside my fan!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan, versatile, sufficient air flow (not the strongest, but still OK). The only problem is that every time i have it on oscillating, it makes a noise, extremely similar to a man on a phone saying "Hello?". I don't know how to stop it from doing that noise, as it was driving me crazy the first couple of days. I thought i wasn't hanging up my phone properly. It slowly getting worse and louder, so we'll see how it goes. Other than the noise, everything is OK.
customer_reviews.author: 19Henry83

customer_reviews.title: It makes a noise.
customer_reviews.text: I had the older model in black and loved it. When we painted our room a lighter color we ordered this newer version in white. We kept hearing a dog barking in the distance and realized, after a few days of this, that it's a tiny mechanical sound the fan makes when its oscillating back and forth. We're quiet people who don't watch tv or play music in our bedroom, so this sound became kind of annoying to us. If you have a noisier environment you won't notice it at all. It's very low. Still, I removed a star. Otherwise it's fantastic. It cools off a greater area than you'd imagine.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Ibis

customer_reviews.title: A chance to take
customer_reviews.text: Half of the time, you’ll get a fan that works. While the other half of the time, I’d say you’d get a broken one. They do not ship it in a cardboard-package box. They just ship it in its actual box. This is how it gets damaged. When it’s damaged, it usually rattles. But! The fan is tiny and powerful for those who want one for nightstands, side tables, or even for their kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the Boro
customer_reviews.text: This could possibly be a great item. In general, Lasko products are well made and works like a dream. I live near the factory and have purchased Lasko heaters and fans in the past. But I purchased a new item and received a used resealed damaged box. The motor of the fan smelled, there were minor scratches and no inside packaging or instructions for operation. Needless to say it was returned and replaced with a different Lasko fan.
customer_reviews.author: Happy @ 60

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fan For Cooling a Small Room
customer_reviews.text: After a warm day, and the temperature outside has cooled, I use this fan to keep my room cool overnight. The fan has 3 speeds, which is great; oscillates as well and because you can adjust the top and bottom separately, allows for more space to be cooled.
customer_reviews.author: M. Slavin

customer_reviews.title: Loud scruffy fan
customer_reviews.text: The fan I received has scuff marks all over (see pics). After I looked over other comments, seems like it’s quite common for at least the platinum/grey model. I’m returning it. For the brief period I turned on the fan, it’s very loud on the high setting. I don’t think, I would have been able to use it in my office - it would have been inconsiderate to other people. The medium and low setting weren’t as bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ranu

customer_reviews.title: Product was NOT NEW and DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I could tell from the condition of the box that the product was not new. When I opened it, there was a crack along the back of the fan case. I did plug it in and only the highest speed would work, the 2 other speeds did not come on. So disappointed. I have an older version of this fan which I love and wanted a back-up. Company never called me back, just sent a return ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M. Goldenberg

customer_reviews.title: okay fan moves the air well enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little fan to take on vacation, but before we could go our ductless ac had an issue and I used every fan I could during a heatwave. It worked well an the countertop, but did not push much air. Only the top unit moves , I thought they both would. It was a good addition not not good enough for a room.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Heitman

customer_reviews.title: No - Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Have been a fan (no pun intended) of Lasko fans for a long time. We bought this for my sons college apartment, turned it on and wow. Very noisy - even at the lowest speed, not typical quality of other Lasko fans we purchased and has a constant motor smell. For the amount of noise their should be a lot more air movement.
customer_reviews.author: SJLUNICK

customer_reviews.title: Loud fan at highest setting
customer_reviews.text: Not a strong fan at all and can be very loud when using the highest setting so I just use the second one which is weaker but less loud. The only thing that I really like about this is that it is vertical and saves space on a table. I use it near my bed when sleeping and my desk. I can't use it from farther away because it's too weak and doesn't reach. Needs to be used near you.
customer_reviews.author: cuteBeagleButt

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan but came like it was used
customer_reviews.text: While the box I received seemed like new and the fan itself also seems fine I noticed on the bottom of the fan there were a ton of scratches on it like it was heavily used. Unfortunately, my laziness trumped trying to return it and get a new one so I kept it. The fan works great so far and has great settings options.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply built, noisy product...
customer_reviews.text: The fan is noisy, and has a consistent vibration coming from within. It is cheap in price and in quality. I would not recommend it for your bedroom, and much less for sleeping. I will be taking mine to my office where the noise level will just blend in with other noises. A cheaply built, low quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique 003 1/2

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I received what is obviously a used box that had been poorly re-taped. The fan had been used because of the scratches and marks on the bottom of it. I don't know if there was supposed to be a remote control with it - there wasn't. I am a regular Amazon customer and am very disappointed that they would expect someone to be happy paying for a new item to receive such junk. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Texan

customer_reviews.title: The noise it makes is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.text: I use this fan in a small room, my bathroom that has a southern window and gets too warm in the summertime. It moves the air quite sufficiently. I like the oscillation and the multi-directional features. However, the noise level is awful. It is loud and after it has been running for awhile it starts to vibrate even on the low speed. I would gladly return it, but I noticed on my order list that the "return window" is up on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ken simpson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my desk at the office
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my desk at the office. The highest setting is a little noisy, but medium is good and low is very quiet. Note: The two sections don't oscillate separately. You have the ability to turn the upper fan so it isn't in line with the lower fan, which allows the whole unit to cover a larger are when the lower fan oscillates. It's nice!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Gochnauer

customer_reviews.title: Good output, not so quiet
customer_reviews.text: Nice little sturdy fan. Great air output. With Amazon Prime 2-day shipping tho, it took 5 days to arrive! (Sun-Fri) I have it on a nightstand in an average size bedroom and along with the ceiling fan, it cools down the room nice when I don't want to run the AC. Noise level on high is loud, on low, not so bad, like a low volume radio or t.v. But not as loud as that old oscillating fan from the '80's I had in my closet and forgot about!
customer_reviews.author: C.C. Mel

customer_reviews.title: Dont recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that this fan is so quiet. I researched noise-making fans solely for that purpose and this was highly rated. I guess everyone is different in opinion but honestly the reviews were extremely false. This fan is small and attractive but does not block any noise. I unfortunately ordered 2 for last minute guests and now am stuck with them. If you want a small fan that fits on a nightstand and is attractive this would work. However is also not effective at blowing much air.
customer_reviews.author: Julie H.

customer_reviews.title: Not really a desk fan
customer_reviews.text: I would categorize this more of a "personal cooler." Even on the lowest setting it's likely to clear your desktop of any papers you may have lying there. It's also noisy (IMO)--not just the kind of sound you typically associate with a fan: mechanical noises such as rattling and additional noise--annoying to me--when it oscillates. One additional annoyance is the limited number of buttons for operation means repeatedly pressing a button to turn on/off and set the fan speed each time of operation; some sore of dedicated control for speed (setting retained when powered off) would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Kelley

customer_reviews.title: What's a little noise if you want to be cool
customer_reviews.text: Yes it can be a little on the noisy side depending on the speed, but if you want cool...this is it. I use mine all the time, in fact I have three of them....each in its own room!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bedside fan
customer_reviews.text: I simply cannot say enough good things about this fan. My husband has always slept with a fan at his bedside, but when we moved into a small apartment, we didn't have the space. Enter: this amazing fan. This fan sits comfortably on his bedside table. Despite it's small size, this fan is POWERFUL! yet virtually soundless, thanks to the tower design. The ability to twist the tower to cover a wider area is great. My husband doesn't miss his full-sized fan at all. We leave the fan running all of the time, and so far it's lasted three years! I was so jealous of his new fan, I bought one for myself! Cooler, happier nights for both of us!
customer_reviews.author: intherain

customer_reviews.title: Rattles, noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Always used Lasko fans, have 3 in the house. This is an updated version of one I have. Was quiet the first couple days. Now it has a Weird vibration sound and rattling. Very disappointed. Will look into returning it but I don't have the original box b/c it worked for a couple days. Edit: After a few weeks, it's even louder than when I got it. It also now, for some reason, cycles. Speeds up & slows down. Had to take it out of bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki Desnoyers

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 of them!
customer_reviews.text: I have one either side of my monitor at the office. Quiet and auto-rotating for that constant light "breeze" effect of being outside. Well worth the money for small desktop fans.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Hill

customer_reviews.title: Very loud, strong odor.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan overall. But it's beyond loud. Not just the sound of a fan, but the parts vibrate so badly that it makes even more noise than it should. It smelled very very heavily if plastic for the first week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: I work in a hair salon in Texas so it gets pretty humid. This fits nicely on my station while giving me plenty of cool air. I really like that it has 4 intensity settings.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my desk at work on those hot Texas days and during my hot flashes. It does make a hmmm but not noticeable. I’d describe it as white noise. Cools me off just like a fan should.
customer_reviews.author: Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great fan easy to carry around if needed
customer_reviews.text: Great and powerful unit, with the recent heat waves it was refreshing to have a small fan in my office ... it's also easy to carry around if needed to be
customer_reviews.author: Miso To

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. It has the ability to direct air in 2 directions without even oscillating. I have 2. The one in the kitchen is especially great [especially in Phoenix].
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Wayyyyyy too loud.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god this fan is SO loud. I like a small amount of fan noise as white noise when i sleep but this does NOT do that- it’s incredibly so incredibly loud. It sounds like it’s falling apart too, it’s not a constant one toned sound. On the lowest setting I could hear it clearly from the hall outside my bedroom. Don’t know how anyone could get anything done much less sleep with this thing on. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Paula R

customer_reviews.title: ... dancing screws.
customer_reviews.text: Box was beat, I can deal, but there are 2 or 3 screws crashing about and I see them. Physically witnessing them dancing. I did not start up the fan because I do not want to risk it breaking. I find it very unprofessional and I have to return it as soon as I got it. I ordered a new and hope I do not have the same experience again.
customer_reviews.author: sarah e.

customer_reviews.title: Good little fan
customer_reviews.text: I like that is so practical and don’t need a lot of space I had one already but my husband took it for his shop so I had to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mirtala Zapata

customer_reviews.title: "Used - Very Good" 4916 Lasko Fan died after less than a month
customer_reviews.text: This "Used - Very Good" condition Lasko model 4916 Fan broke after less than a month of usein my office - just 3 days after the return window closed of course. Do yourself a favor and pay the extra money to buy new so you have an actual warranty to rely on and don't trust Amazon's listed description of item conditions so you don't get stuck with a paperweight like I did..or just buy a different model from a different seller altogether. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E.

customer_reviews.title: LOUD FAN
customer_reviews.text: Needed something small to move air in living room ..l LOUD LOUD LOUD . Puts out good air but the sounds yes sou d will drive you mad ..I want to throw it away dont buy
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: YES!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this small fan. I bought one for work and loved it so much, I bought one for an area at home that heats up in the summer time. This solved both areas. I'm super glad I purchased two. Best decision.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Good room fan
customer_reviews.text: These are great fans. They have low/medium/high and oscillate. I have bought several. They really can cool off a room. I have bought them for my office too. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a month. It has developed this annoying sound. I think it is a loose bearing or out of alignment. I purchased this same fan four years ago and loved it. The quality of this new fan is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Twinmutter

customer_reviews.title: Compact, yet powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Great fan for such a compact size. Takes up about as much space as a large oatmeal container. Bottom and top halves can be focused at different angles. The only downfall that I can see is that you cannot disassemble to clean, and dust does build up over time. I guess this is one way for you to have to repurchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: MarcyOnMaui

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: love the product, speed of delivery was great too. this is just the right size and because it oscillates- yet small enough for the desk and has 3 speed settings, I am very happy with this product and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CLawson

customer_reviews.title: Power light is too bright at night
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan except for one thing. I’m pretty sure you can see the power light from space. Super bright. However the fan works well, blows cool and is not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy and Judy Igielinski

customer_reviews.title: Just Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a window fan, to blow cold air into my room while I slept, and it worked great for the first two weeks, a little loud, but I liked that, it was soothing. After a couple weeks, it just stopped working. I though my breaker had popped, but I saw my night light was still on, plugged into the same extension cord. I tried unplugging it to see if that worked, but it didn't. The light was still on, so it should have been working, but just wasn't. I can't know if this was just an isolated incident, just this one fan had a malfunctioning part, or what.
customer_reviews.author: CaliMarshal

customer_reviews.title: Very Noisy For A Desktop Fan
customer_reviews.text: I chose this fan because of the reviews, and many of them said that this fan was quiet. I disagree. It's quite noisy even in a semi-quiet office. However as far as air flow, even on low, it puts out a lot of breeze.
customer_reviews.author: *Sparkilee*

customer_reviews.title: Engine sound!
customer_reviews.text: This fan does have a good air flow for it's small size. I got it for white noise and it sounds like a small plane engine that revs up and down that my wife hates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the coverage with air flow it creates
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the coverage with air flow it creates. I use it until bathroom to help circulate air flow while getting ready. It's a decent size and doesn't take much space on the countertop. But the average small round fans are adjustable to pointing up/dwn on directions. This is extremely limited. Hadn't thought of that, until in use.
customer_reviews.author: Life is Fun

customer_reviews.title: Great well made product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to put in the bedroom on my boat. Keeps the air moving at night as needed. Really liked the separate upper and lower directional independent fans. And very quiet at all speeds. Just recently purchased an identical one of these to put in the other end of my boat to circulate the AC.
customer_reviews.author: fsgjdsmith

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my bedroom/office. The review asks about a remote. I did not get a remote with it but still works awesome
customer_reviews.author: Kellyjo

customer_reviews.title: Great Job Amazon...Not!
customer_reviews.text: Again..you re-packaged someone else's return. There should be no need to open the manufacturers box to check to see if the item is new. The one that came was clearly run before. Fan blades are dusty, fan is scratched, motor/bearing is warped/twisted and vibrates. Clearly looks used and was probably dropped. I guess I now have to open everything you send me and check it...
customer_reviews.author: steven collins

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Cool little fan! I like how it is sectioned, so that you can have the two ends pointing in different directions. Useful when oscillating, believe it or not. Constant breeze, but never getting too cold. It provides a decent ambient noise in the room. I am a veteran suffering from Tinnitus from an IED in Iraq, and this fan is loud enough to cancel out any ringing, but quiet enough to sleep next to.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan M

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: This fan is soooo noisy! I got rid of my old fan because it started tattling etc. I ordered this one becuase a similar one at work that is nice and quiet. This is so loud I have to turn it off. Still Bummed
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great next to your bedside
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of a review I read from a senior and he was right - I use to suffer from night sweats and now I don't - which is why I bought it - light weight, fits practically anywhere. I thought it was a good product.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Good fan, but quality is down
customer_reviews.text: Good little desk fan, but build quality is worse than my last fan that was same model. The buttons are misaligned. But, it works and it's cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Five G in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Makes vibrating noise after couple minutes on.
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these fans for past year and like it, so ordered another. This second one made this loud annoying, sort of pulsing vibrating noise. I tightened all screws, but had no effect, so I returned it and ordered a replacement. Now, this latest fan sounds fine right when I turn it on, but then after about 2 to 5 minutes it also starts to make this pulsing noise (the fan is not turning, is set to be still). I wish I could have gotten a quiet one like the first one I bought. But for the noise I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MSM

customer_reviews.title: Small and efficient table top fan
customer_reviews.text: Fan works great. Medium and Low speed are basically the same. No remote. Fits on tabletop for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing specifically wrong with this. Even though it's small, I think the fan could be a bit stronger and I'd prefer the ability to adjust the air fins up and down also.
customer_reviews.author: Caveat Emptor

customer_reviews.title: Good Air Output But Loud
customer_reviews.text: Very loud and fan mechanism rattles and is loud on any setting other than low. While air output is good for the small fan. It is too loud to have bedside or on higher than low and that’s coming from a deep sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Ploutz

customer_reviews.title: Great FAN!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan! It's very powerful and pretty quiet for the power that it has. Great for work or even home use. I would definitely recommend it to anyone. I love the fast the the two sections can be pointed different ways because it gives you the option to reach more of the area.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Nice computer desktop fan
customer_reviews.text: Well I have had three of these. Two I am still using. One we had to return because it ran so noisy. When we received the last one, the box was suspiciously taped as if it had been returned, and I bet it had been. When I removed the fan from the box, there was obviously something loose in it. We turned it on and it worked, but we were concerned about the rattle. After shaking it a bit, we found there was a screw loose inside it. We were able to use tweezers to remove the screw. I have the fan sitting beside my computer monitor. It blows nicely on my face in all 3 settings.
customer_reviews.author: Nibor  Diva Tsidun

customer_reviews.title: great little desktop fan
customer_reviews.text: I use this fan on my nightstand in the summer. I like that you can choose the speed and osculating or not. It's medium loud. I'd buy this one again if something happened to it.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Innovative design works well
customer_reviews.text: This vertical design met a very specific need to occupy the smallest footprint, while covering a wide pattern at variable speeds. I'm quite satisfied that it met all my needs and with the exception of an extra sound (like rubbing or brinding) at the end of each oscillation, I'm pleased with the performance. I hope that the extra rubbing sound works its way out over time. I found it puts out plenty of air at fairly quiet noise level and the Lasko name has been very trustworthy in my purchasing for several decades. I'd say they did it again and hit a home run.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Decent air flow, but kind of loud.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the split vent design. It has a decent air flow output. But, it is fairely loud on its highest setting. Overall the noise is tolerable, and I am happy with my purchase. But, if you need a completely silent fan, this one is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jupiter28

customer_reviews.title: Exaclty what I needed for my home office.
customer_reviews.text: This fan is perfect for my home office which gets sun later in the day and can get rather warm. I had another one that did not oscillate, and found the constant draft in one spot was too much and became annoying. The fact that this one oscillates AND allows you to put the top part and the bottom part at slightly different angles, gives a nice constantly changing flow of air. Not much of a noise level at all, so makes it very easy to have on all day. Very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jide's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice but
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a smaller fan. This is nice. A fan that can oscillate - it is ok. A quiet fan to use in the office on your desk or on your nightstand? It is on the louder side. On the positive side. It runs with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Silber

customer_reviews.title: Lasko 4916 Desktop Wind Tower Oscillating Fan
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for a small fan. Wish it titled up and down and not just side to side, but it works good and is quiet enough on the low fan setting for my office desk. When the company cuts our building cooling off or sets the temperature to a very high setting on the weekends, this small fan saves me on Mondays and Tuesdays until the building temperature cools down. I have found that it is a little too loud for my liking on high in a quiet area like my desk. I can use it on high, but prefer the low setting.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Slingshot

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Office
customer_reviews.text: I can control the air flow, which is important when you have papers around your office. I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Used not new
customer_reviews.text: I must have received a used product. Not that they effect the performance of the fan but there are small nicks and scratches on fan and the box came taped together. There is also a strong odor to it. Will be returning since I thought I was ordering a new product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela H.

customer_reviews.title: Can blow 2 different diredtions at once
customer_reviews.text: Nice little fan that takes little counter space and can either oscillate or blow 2 different directions at once. Is fairly quiet and easy to use. Works well in out kitchen which lacks air flow.
customer_reviews.author: Fixermun

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan.
customer_reviews.text: I am one of thise people that likes to sleep with a fan blowing on my face and this was perfect. Not sure about oscillation noise others compkain about (mine seems quiet enough) but fan is perfect on night stand. Very quiet even on high (hey...every fan makes noise moving air). Doesn't bother me at all. Power light is a little bright so just put a small piece of tape over most of it. On low or medium, air dissipates within a few feet so doesn't bother my wife. Overall a great little fan.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Very loud in an office environment
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with how loud this fan is. I ordered it because a coworker had one and the noise level was not very loud at all. Mine is very loud and doesn’t have a remote. I do like the fact that the fan oscillates and the top and bottom can be twisted to face in different directions.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Turner

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Have used this fan nightly for less than a month and the rotation part has started making a horrible racket. I had my previous Lasko fan for 8 summers before it gave out so decided to try another one. Big mistake as it is so noisy when rotating that I can’t sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Lettie B.

customer_reviews.title: Small but very powerful
customer_reviews.text: The wind is really powerful, I love it! I wanted to order another one but no longer on Amazon 🙁
customer_reviews.author: dbaby

customer_reviews.title: Good counter top fan
customer_reviews.text: Great little fan! We use it in our kitchen and it makes cooking & cleaning a little easier since this fan makes for a constant breeze. What’s also nice is that it oscillates and has 3 speeds. No complaints so far. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: NestorG

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: The fan worked fine. It’s probably worthy of a five star review. But I bought it for white noise and it wasn’t loud enough so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kait27

customer_reviews.title: Not Loud Enough
customer_reviews.text: If you need that LOUD FAN sound. Y’all know what I mean. This is not the fan for you. But it’s kicks out air nicely and is a very good size.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Deroche

customer_reviews.title: Great desk or small room fan
customer_reviews.text: Great little fan. Love how you can adjust direction of the air w upper and lower swivel. Also, oscillates very happy have it is silver and black
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Fan
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son. His room stays very hot. We like the fact it has 2 sections you can point in different directions. When it oscillates it covers more area. It is very quiet and small enough to fit right in to a very small cluttered space and not be overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Queen

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Great air flow. Perfect size for my office. Vert loud with a rattle. Sometimes if it is on for a long period of time, my head will start to hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The fan was great at first, used for white noise at night, but now it makes a broken sound most of the time, like the fan is messed up. It's okay, I still use it, but I'm disappointed that it only lasted a month.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Tarr

customer_reviews.title: Too loud and rattles ~ VERY LITTLE BREEZE
customer_reviews.text: This fan is very loud and rattles. I bought 2 and they were both loud and rattled. I have heavy metal fans that are quieter. This fan doesn't provide much of a breeze either. For as loud as they are I would expect a better air flow. The twist option for a wider circulation does nothing. In fact, the lower half blows out almost no air. I sent them both back.
customer_reviews.author: CamVetteGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good fan.  Lots of air flow
customer_reviews.text: Good for a bathroom to push humidity out. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Started making a rattling noise after a few hours on. Not good
customer_reviews.author: Mike Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is our second of these. I use them when I start tomato and pepper plants indoors. The gentle oscillating breeze makes the stems strong.
customer_reviews.author: Keith W

customer_reviews.title: Great little Fan
customer_reviews.text: This is our second fan... love how it separates at the mid center. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little loud but bearable, hard to clean, ...
customer_reviews.text: A little loud but bearable, hard to clean, but the price was right, it's compact, it worked for what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is a good fan for a nightstand or desk top use. Its not powerful enough to cool any further than 4ft away. That you can adjust the top & bottom of the in differing directions is a great feature because even when it is oscilatting you can have the air directed on you. If it were more powerful I wouldhave given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: imlynnadok

product_meta.title: Lasko 4910 Desk Top Wind Tower Fan
product_meta.description: Color:4910Is your desk missing something? Lasko's unique #4910 fan is the perfect companion for your days at the office. You won't sweat the deadlines with the Platinum Desktop Wind Tower. Its unique look will make your coworkers envious and its amazing performance will keep you cool. Perfect in your home too!
feature_bullets: ETL Listed product. Built-in carry handle
Unique desktop fan with front-mounted electronic controls
Pivoting top module enables air movement in 2 stationary directions
Optional oscillation provides even greater coverage
3 speeds; fully assembled; slim, space-saving size; ETL listed. Patented fused safety plug.
Measures 6 by 6 by 14 inches; 1-year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,513 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
